name: One NighT PC
description:
You are a game developer and you worked about 48 hours in a row. After you finish your project you sleep about 24 hours and after you wake up, the whole town turn into zombies. Find a way to survive and investigate what happened. 

Solve puzzle and avoid zombie eating your brain. All you can do is run. You can't fight a Zombie because you are too weak.

This is the entry of weekly game jam 122 "One Action".

Please feel free to contact if you found any bug, glitch and grammar errors.

Email : yangoomgames@gmail.com

Please don't forget to Rate and Comment.
